org.jamsim.ascape.ui

Class ScenarioBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jamsim.ascape.ui.ScenarioBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ActionListener, EventListener, org.ascape.runtime.swing.navigator.PanelViewProvider

    public class ScenarioBuilder
extends Object
implements org.ascape.runtime.swing.navigator.PanelViewProvider, ActionListener
    Provides a PanelView based on a ParameterSet. The PanelView contains a table of the ParameterSet as well as update and reset/default buttons, Combo boxes and buttons for the user to build a subgroup formula and a Base Simulation Results table for categorical variables.
    Version:
    $Revision$
    Author:
    Oliver Mannion

    • Constructor Detail

      • ScenarioBuilder

        public ScenarioBuilder(Map<String,Map<String,WeightCalculator>> wcalcsvarmaps,
               Map<String,RExpression> subgroupsToOptions,
               MicroSimScape<?> scape)
        Creates a ScenarioBuilder. Sets up the combo boxes, combo box models and maps used to apply the user's selections. Builds the Swing components using the Swing JavaBuilder library.
        Parameters:
        wcalcsvarmaps - Weight Calculators used to create the Scenario Proportions table
        subgroupsToOptions - Descriptions and corresponding R expressions used for the combo boxes and to build the user's R expression
        scape - The scape
